video.title: It's Okay, That's Love
video.synopsis: Successful novelist and radio DJ Jae-yeol and psychiatrist Hae-soo are constantly at odds, but that changes when they start living in the same house.

episodes.synopsis: A psychiatrist with relationship issues looks forward to meeting a handsome, charismatic author whose novels she admires, but she's soon disappointed.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: When Jae Yul's new novel comes out, he learns that his plagiarizing ex also released a book, and she is suing him. Hae Soo is surprised by a visitor.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: When Hae Soo kicks Jae Yul out of the house, he prepares a lavish good-bye breakfast. Dong Min and Soo Kwang also risk getting expelled.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Hae Soo rushes out of Jae Yul's apartment after spending the night. While retrieving her cell phone later, she sees him at work -- and in a new light.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Hae Soo loses her temper when Jae Yul returns home with Oh So Nyeo, who spends the night, but she still allows him to accompany her to a concert.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Jae Yul starts to open up to Hae Soo, but after their kiss, she avoids him, thinking that it was just a whim -- until he asks her to date him.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Jae Yul shows Hae Soo his caring side as he prepares breakfast for her before she leaves for the hospital and plans a trip for the two of them.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Hae Soo agrees to a spontaneous trip with Jae Yul, but they start off on the wrong foot. Will an injured arm and petty quarrels ruin a romantic night?
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Hae Soo expresses her affection for Jae Yul while he is writing, which leads to a fight. Soo Kwang reveals his long-held feelings for So Nyeo.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Hae Soo is surprised and hurt when Jae Yul says he is moving out; Tae Yong finds Jae Yul's wallet and sees something that shakes him to the core.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: After they fight, Jae Yul shows his anger at Hae Soo on the air, and she responds in kind; Tae Yong asks Jae Yul to make a call under false pretenses.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Hae Soo realizes Jae Yul's persistent marriage proposals are serious and confides in Dong Min, who finally confronts Jae Yul about Kang Woo.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Hae Soo learns of Jae Yul’s mental disorder and Kang Woo's existence. When she talks to Jae Yul, he tells her that he thinks Kang Woo will soon die.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Hae Soo tries to get Jae Yul forcibly hospitalized and spends one last heartbreaking night with him. Jae Yul gets a final call from Kang Woo.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Jae Yul and Kang Woo -- and Hae Soo -- stay at the hospital, but Hae Soo can only watch Jae Yul from a distance, tormented that she cannot help him.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Aware of Jae Yul's disorder, Hae Soo's mother and sister try to break the two apart. Jae Yul urges Hae Soo to leave him and go to Okinawa for a year.
episodes.title: Episode 16
